sentences.en: According to the 1996 Criminal Procedure Law, audiovisuals is a new kind of proof.
sentences.cn: 视听资料是我国1996年《刑事诉讼法》新规定的一种证据形式。

sentences.en: The workshop is very practical in nature. Lectures are combined with audiovisuals and practice assignments which participants will be able to apply immediately at their workplace.
sentences.cn: 本培训课程非常实用。讲座，视听教具，以及实践任务的相结合，使学员能够在工作场所中立即进行实践。
